The Israel Prize is the People of Israel, is our national asset. The prize must represent all parts of the nation. Composition of the committee that chooses the winners of Israel must be balanced

Over the years, the Electoral Commission were appointed more extreme elements in their positions, including the anti-Zionist cause, and too little authentic representatives of large sections of the people
Too often, committee members seemed extreme divide the prizes to their friends. The winners should be selected without political considerations and without any political bias
